translations: n．刺眼的光线，强烈的光：强烈而刺眼的光线。
v．怒视，瞪眼：用愤怒、敌意或惊讶的眼神看。

sentences.sentence: She glares at me if I go near her desk.
sentences.translation: 我一走近她的办公桌，她就对我瞪眼。

sentences.sentence: The teacher glares and asks "All right!
sentences.translation: 老师瞪大双眼，问道：“够了！

sentences.sentence: My kid brother got warm chuckles, I got perplexed glares.
sentences.translation: 我弟弟他有温暖的轻笑，我总有令人不解的怒视。
